site_title: Ghost/Reaper by Ladislav Kaňka & Easy Origami

block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: It isn't Halloween without a Ghost or two. Learn how to fold this Origami Ghost or Reaper designed by Ladislav Kaňka (LkOrigami) & Easy Origami. This model is really cool Enjoy!!! If you would like to see the original tutorials check the links below: Ladislav Kaňka : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uDqaL1ph1sA Easy Origami : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RNbFcjvZpC0 Here at Heap Art, we are trying to help you practice origami on a regular bases. Every week I will select a minimum of 2 origami models and show you how to fold it. If you like origami and paper airplanes -- Please use the following link to subscribe to my channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/heapart?sub_confirmation=1 My Upload Schedule: Tuesday : A new Paper Airplane, part of my 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge Friday : A new Origami Model never seen before on my channel

block_list.title: More Designs from Ladislav Kaňka &  Easy Origami
